jot.math.geometry.bounding

Class AbstractBoundingVolume

  • java.lang.Object
    • jot.math.geometry.bounding.AbstractBoundingVolume
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Node, Renderable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AABB, BoundingSphere, OBB

    public abstract class AbstractBoundingVolume
extends java.lang.Object
implements Renderable, Node
    Abstract class that all bounding volumes must extend.
    Author:
    G. Amador & A. Gomes
